about_the_game:
The secret game for your desktop. Demo Version.

Enjoy over 100 themed tables, over 50 daily special events and real-time challenges.

Beat the records at all the tables and earn your crowns, badges and increase your prestige. Configure it to play the way you want, even in full screen. Improve yourself.

The Hidden Pinbal is here, with daily challenges, special events and all progression.

Play as you like, small, full screen, with or without sound. All customizable in the info menu, for a quick start.

  • Demo Version includes the table "Black Noir" and Events disabled.

Complete assignments, stars, multipliers and tasks for more XP.

Improve yourself at every table and get the crown at one billion.

Earn Prestige, increase your reputation and get new badges.

Hide the game or remove it with a single button, Paused in the taskbar.

Quick and easy game, beat your records. And enjoy the events.

Improve yourself.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
